sun.datafusion.parser
Class RSSParser

java.lang.Object
  sun.datafusion.parser.RSSParser

public class RSSParser
extends java.lang.Object

The base RSS Parsing object. Takes the needed parameters for logging into the MySQL server with the DataMeans information needed for parsing. Uses libraries in the sun.datafusion.data package; specifically, Manager, DataMeans, and DataStored.

Author:
James McGuinness

Constructor Summary
RSSParser(java.util.Properties prop)
          Creates an RSSParser object, and connects to the MySQL database with the given parameters immediately.
 
Method Summary
 void parse()
          Execute one 'pass' over the DataMeans MySQL table, parsing all new RSS posts and adding them to the DataStored MySQL table.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

RSSParser

public RSSParser(java.util.Properties prop)
Creates an RSSParser object, and connects to the MySQL database with the given parameters immediately.

Parameters:
The - database name
Username - to log in with
Password - to log in with
The - MySQL server ip (usually localhost)
Method Detail

parse

public void parse()
Execute one 'pass' over the DataMeans MySQL table, parsing all new RSS posts and adding them to the DataStored MySQL table. If a DataMeans cannot be parsed, it will be skipped and an error logged.
